name: On Repeat - GMTK Submission
description:
We uploaded an old build for this submission unfortunately and didn't have time to fix it. At this link you can find our actual game jam build, submitted less than an hour after the fact. We hope you check it out as a more accurate tech demo of what we were going for, even if you still vote based on this one!

Controls:

  • Move - WASD/Arrow Keys/Left Analogue Stick on Gamepad
  • Interact - E/X on Gamepad (or Square, etc)
  • Select dialogue option - Mouse Cursor/D-Pad and A (or X, etc)

Credits:

  • Jess Molloy (Game Design, Character Art)
  • Brittney Anthony (Environment Art, Narrative Design)
  • Daniel Williams (Programming, Systems Design)
  • Sharp Loris
